Text.val: 13.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
29.07.2009 GB SCR14759 Replaced CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO by CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO and
11.01.2007 SH SCR12224 Part1: Added calc of group investment
08.01.2007 SH SCR12217 Part 1: Extended selection of INTH with INTH_STARTDATE =< PI.DATEUNTIL
27.11.2006 SH SCR12071 Part 1: Changed calc of v.PROVISION
20.11.2006 SH SCR12071 Added PO.INTERESTEXPENSE and PO.CAPITALCHARGE
-- Convert some variabels to proper pictures which will be used in DSQL tasks
... if group investment < client investment, set calculated client investment=0

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC, :1/LDGR where LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and LGCC_DATE between ':4' and ':5' and LDGR_ADMNO = LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO and LDGR_NO = LGCC_LDGR_NO and LDGR_INCOMETYPE = 2 for fetch only

select cast (avg (CMON_AVGINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH between :5 and :6 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':7' for fetch only

select cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC, :1/ADML where LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and LGCC_DATE between ':4' and ':5' and LGCC_LDGR_NO = ADML_LEDGERNO and ADML_ADMN_NO = LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO and ADML_LTYP_TYPE in (131,132,134) for fetch only

select cast (avg (CMON_AVGINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON, :1/CLNT where CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO = :3 and CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH between :5 and :6 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':7' for fetch only

select cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC, :1/ADML, :1/CLNT where CLNT104_VORTEX_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_VORTEX_CLNTNO = :3 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and LGCC_DATE between ':4' and ':5' and LGCC_LDGR_NO = ADML_LEDGERNO and ADML_ADMN_NO = LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO and ADML_LTYP_TYPE in (131,132,134) for fetch only

select cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC, :1/LDGR, :1/ADML where LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and LGCC_DATE between ':4' and ':5' and LDGR_ADMNO = LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO and LDGR_NO = LGCC_LDGR_NO and LDGR_INCOMETYPE = 1 and LGCC_LDGR_NO = ADML_LEDGERNO and ADML_ADMN_NO = LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO and ADML_LTYP_TYPE = 87 for fetch only

select cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC, :1/LDGR where LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and LGCC_DATE between ':4' and ':5' and LDGR_ADMNO = LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO and LDGR_NO = LGCC_LDGR_NO and LDGR_INCOMETYPE = 1 for fetch only
